title: jaya jaya jaya
sahitya:
jaya jaya jaya shrIkarNATaka janAdhArA



anupallavi



 jaya jaya jaya shAmEshvara jaya jaya saubhAgyAkArA



caraNam

 siri vikrama vatsarada cArubAdrasida sogasitE nIrajApta vAsaradE surucira tulA lagnadE porevanendu

 nija rAjyava karadoLu kankaNa kaTTudE EripaTTavaNeye nAdE moravammeya parama bhAgyaderaya

 nimage cAmunDikE shirAyurA rOgyangaLa karuNAmbudhi sallisude kAyali harikEsha kAntE
